mapper.sql: select T.ROW_ID as id, date_format(T.CREATED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as created, T.CREATED_BY as createdBy, date_format(T.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as lastUpdated, T.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy, t1.NAME couponName, t1.CODE couponCode, round(t.DISPLAY_SEQ) displaySeq, t.STATUS status, t2.O2O_DISPLAY_NAME prodName, t2.O2O_INT_CODE prodCode, t.COUPON_ID couponId, t.PROD_ID prodId, t.PIC_ID picId, t3.path picUrl, t.CAM_ID camId
from CX_O_CAM_LINE t LEFT JOIN CX_O_PMO_SP t1 on t1.ROW_ID= t.COUPON_ID LEFT JOIN S_PROD_INT_X t2 on t2.PAR_ROW_ID=t.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN CX_O_IMG t3 on t3.ROW_ID=t.PIC_ID
mapper.insert: insert into CX_O_CAM_LINE (ROW_ID, DISPLAY_SEQ, STATUS,COUPON_ID, PROD_ID,CAM_ID) values (#{id},lnk_blank_str_to_null(#{displaySeq,jdbcType=FLOAT}),#{status},#{couponId},#{prodId},#{camId})
